import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from "react" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { showDetailNotification} from '../../action/Notifications' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function NotificationDetailList() { const notifications = useSelector(state => state.notifications) const param = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() =>{ dispatch(showDetailNotification(param)) },[param, dispatch]) return ( <>
